technical.title: Technical Hardware Issues
technical.description: Computer won't start, runs slowly, or freezes
quickTips: Check if the computer is properly connected to power
Check if all cables are securely connected
Note any error messages that appear

network.title: Network and Internet Issues
network.description: No internet connection or slow speed
quickTips: Check if the network cable is connected
Check if other devices have internet access
Try connecting to a different network

security.title: Security Issues
security.description: Suspicious files, viruses, or security breaches
quickTips: Do not open suspicious files or links
Change passwords if you suspect a breach
Disconnect from the internet if necessary

printer.title: Printer Issues
printer.description: Printer won't print, paper jam, or print quality issues
quickTips: Check if the printer is turned on and connected

account.title: Account Issues
account.description: Can't log in, forgot password, or access issues
quickTips: Check if Caps Lock is on

billing.title: Billing Questions
billing.description: Issues with bills, payments, or financial questions

general.title: General Questions
general.description: Information requests or general system questions
quickTips: Be as specific as possible in your question

other.title: Other Issue
other.description: Problem that doesn't fit other categories
quickTips: Mention what you expected to happen
